formDefinition.formName: Councillor casework - Information required from Councillor

props.navigateAwayWarning: Are you sure you want to navigate away? All progress in this form will be lost.

submission.message:
Case updated

Your reference number
{case_ref}

What happens next

@af:if({councillorAction} icontains 'Gather the information and provide update later')

Your email has been sent to those you have selected to notify. The case will remain assigned to you awaiting the next update. You can continue your case through 'My Cases'.

Your next task is due by {nextTaskDueDate}. If you do not complete your task by this date, your case will be closed automatically.

@endaf:if

@af:if({councillorAction} icontains 'Provide further information requested')

Your update will be added to the case and the case will be returned to the assigned team. Any other Councillors that you've requested to be kept informed will also receive your update.

You can track your case or view/add case notes in 'My Cases'. You can access 'My Cases' from the homepage of the portal.

You will receive a response by {nextTaskDueDate}.

@endaf:if

@af:if({councillorAction} icontains 'Resolve case')

Your update will be added to the case. The case will remain assigned to you awaiting confirmation that it can be closed. Any other Councillors that you've requested to be kept informed will receive the case resolution notes once you've confirmed the case is closed in your next task. You can continue your case through 'My Cases'.

Your next task is due by {nextTaskDueDate}. If you do not complete your task by this date, your case will be closed automatically.

@endaf:if

Please press the Continue button below to return to 'My Cases'.

60fab1e18cfe1.Name: GDS address lookup - search postcode
60fab1e18cfe1.Output_template:
{"systemID":"591f0b36ca340","systemName":"Granicus Solutions Read","query":"SELECT CONCAT(trim(concat(sao,' ',pao)),' ',street_name,', ',town_name) AS display, uprn AS name,
sao AS flat,
pao AS house,
street_name AS street,
town_name AS town , 
county_name AS county,
postcode,
uprn,
usrn,
ward,
lng,
lat,
locality_name AS locality
FROM llpgcache
WHERE 
(
(REPLACE(postcode, ' ','') = REPLACE({searchPostcode},' ',''))
OR (concat(trim(concat(sao,' ',pao)),' ',street_name) like concat('%',{searchPostcode},'%'))
)
AND length(REPLACE({searchPostcode},' ',''))>5
ORDER BY pao,sao,street_name ASC LIMIT 100","results_page_columns_db":"","secure_fields_db_database":"","escapeTokens":"yes"}

5c89177484036.Name: LLPG - search postcode or street name - return full address
5c89177484036.Output_template:
{"systemID":"591f0b36ca340","systemName":"Granicus Solutions Read","query":"SELECT 
	CONCAT(trim(concat(sao,' ',pao)),' ',street_name,', ',town_name,', ',postcode) as display,
	uprn as name,
	sao as flat,
	pao as house,
	street_name as street,
	town_name as town , 
	county_name as county,
	postcode,
	uprn,
	ward,
	lng,
	lat,
	locality_name as locality,
	usrn
FROM 
	llpgcache
WHERE 
(
(REPLACE(postcode, ' ','') = REPLACE({address_search},' ',''))
OR (concat(trim(concat(sao,' ',pao)),' ',street_name) like concat('%',{address_search},'%'))
)
AND length(REPLACE({address_search},' ',''))>3
OR street_name = {address_search}
ORDER BY pao,sao,street_name ASC LIMIT 100","results_page_columns_db":"","secure_fields_db_database":"","escapeTokens":"yes"}

60fab1e18cfe1.Name: GDS address lookup - search postcode
60fab1e18cfe1.Output_template:
{"systemID":"591f0b36ca340","systemName":"Granicus Solutions Read","query":"SELECT CONCAT(trim(concat(sao,' ',pao)),' ',street_name,', ',town_name) AS display, uprn AS name,
sao AS flat,
pao AS house,
street_name AS street,
town_name AS town , 
county_name AS county,
postcode,
uprn,
usrn,
ward,
lng,
lat,
locality_name AS locality
FROM llpgcache
WHERE 
(
(REPLACE(postcode, ' ','') = REPLACE({searchPostcode},' ',''))
OR (concat(trim(concat(sao,' ',pao)),' ',street_name) like concat('%',{searchPostcode},'%'))
)
AND length(REPLACE({searchPostcode},' ',''))>5
ORDER BY pao,sao,street_name ASC LIMIT 100","results_page_columns_db":"","secure_fields_db_database":"","escapeTokens":"yes"}

5c89177484036.Name: LLPG - search postcode or street name - return full address
5c89177484036.Output_template:
{"systemID":"591f0b36ca340","systemName":"Granicus Solutions Read","query":"SELECT 
	CONCAT(trim(concat(sao,' ',pao)),' ',street_name,', ',town_name,', ',postcode) as display,
	uprn as name,
	sao as flat,
	pao as house,
	street_name as street,
	town_name as town , 
	county_name as county,
	postcode,
	uprn,
	ward,
	lng,
	lat,
	locality_name as locality,
	usrn
FROM 
	llpgcache
WHERE 
(
(REPLACE(postcode, ' ','') = REPLACE({address_search},' ',''))
OR (concat(trim(concat(sao,' ',pao)),' ',street_name) like concat('%',{address_search},'%'))
)
AND length(REPLACE({address_search},' ',''))>3
OR street_name = {address_search}
ORDER BY pao,sao,street_name ASC LIMIT 100","results_page_columns_db":"","secure_fields_db_database":"","escapeTokens":"yes"}

</xsl:stylesheet>","strip_namespaces":"1","path_to_values":"councillorID/councillor","results_page_columns":""}

submission.message:
Case updated

Your reference number
{case_ref}

What happens next

@af:if({serviceAreaAction} icontains 'Assign to a different service area to action')

The case will be assigned to the service area selected. The Councillor who submitted the case will receive a notification that their case has been assigned.

@endaf:if

@af:if({serviceAreaAction} icontains 'Need further information from Councillor')

The case will be assigned back to the Councillor who submitted the case. They will receive a notification with the above update, which will also be added to the Progress updates section.

@endaf:if

@af:if({serviceAreaAction} icontains 'Record progress update')

The case will remain assigned to you and the above update will be sent to the Councillor who submitted the case and any other Councillors they've requested to be kept informed. The update will also be added to the Progress updates section.

Your next task will be due on {nextTaskDueDate}.

@endaf:if

@af:if({serviceAreaAction} icontains 'Resolve case')

The case will be assigned to the Councillor who submitted the request to confirm that the case is resolved. Your update will also be sent to any other Councillors they've requested to be kept informed. The update will also be added to the Progress updates section.

@endaf:if

Press the Continue button below to return to CaseViewer.

60fab1e18cfe1.Name: GDS address lookup - search postcode
60fab1e18cfe1.Output_template:
{"systemID":"591f0b36ca340","systemName":"Granicus Solutions Read","query":"SELECT CONCAT(trim(concat(sao,' ',pao)),' ',street_name,', ',town_name) AS display, uprn AS name,
sao AS flat,
pao AS house,
street_name AS street,
town_name AS town , 
county_name AS county,
postcode,
uprn,
usrn,
ward,
lng,
lat,
locality_name AS locality
FROM llpgcache
WHERE 
(
(REPLACE(postcode, ' ','') = REPLACE({searchPostcode},' ',''))
OR (concat(trim(concat(sao,' ',pao)),' ',street_name) like concat('%',{searchPostcode},'%'))
)
AND length(REPLACE({searchPostcode},' ',''))>5
ORDER BY pao,sao,street_name ASC LIMIT 100","results_page_columns_db":"","secure_fields_db_database":"","escapeTokens":"yes"}

5c89177484036.Name: LLPG - search postcode or street name - return full address
5c89177484036.Output_template:
{"systemID":"591f0b36ca340","systemName":"Granicus Solutions Read","query":"SELECT 
	CONCAT(trim(concat(sao,' ',pao)),' ',street_name,', ',town_name,', ',postcode) as display,
	uprn as name,
	sao as flat,
	pao as house,
	street_name as street,
	town_name as town , 
	county_name as county,
	postcode,
	uprn,
	ward,
	lng,
	lat,
	locality_name as locality,
	usrn
FROM 
	llpgcache
WHERE 
(
(REPLACE(postcode, ' ','') = REPLACE({address_search},' ',''))
OR (concat(trim(concat(sao,' ',pao)),' ',street_name) like concat('%',{address_search},'%'))
)
AND length(REPLACE({address_search},' ',''))>3
OR street_name = {address_search}
ORDER BY pao,sao,street_name ASC LIMIT 100","results_page_columns_db":"","secure_fields_db_database":"","escapeTokens":"yes"}

60fab1e18cfe1.Name: GDS address lookup - search postcode
60fab1e18cfe1.Output_template:
{"systemID":"591f0b36ca340","systemName":"Granicus Solutions Read","query":"SELECT CONCAT(trim(concat(sao,' ',pao)),' ',street_name,', ',town_name) AS display, uprn AS name,
sao AS flat,
pao AS house,
street_name AS street,
town_name AS town , 
county_name AS county,
postcode,
uprn,
usrn,
ward,
lng,
lat,
locality_name AS locality
FROM llpgcache
WHERE 
(
(REPLACE(postcode, ' ','') = REPLACE({searchPostcode},' ',''))
OR (concat(trim(concat(sao,' ',pao)),' ',street_name) like concat('%',{searchPostcode},'%'))
)
AND length(REPLACE({searchPostcode},' ',''))>5
ORDER BY pao,sao,street_name ASC LIMIT 100","results_page_columns_db":"","secure_fields_db_database":"","escapeTokens":"yes"}

5c89177484036.Name: LLPG - search postcode or street name - return full address
5c89177484036.Output_template:
{"systemID":"591f0b36ca340","systemName":"Granicus Solutions Read","query":"SELECT 
	CONCAT(trim(concat(sao,' ',pao)),' ',street_name,', ',town_name,', ',postcode) as display,
	uprn as name,
	sao as flat,
	pao as house,
	street_name as street,
	town_name as town , 
	county_name as county,
	postcode,
	uprn,
	ward,
	lng,
	lat,
	locality_name as locality,
	usrn
FROM 
	llpgcache
WHERE 
(
(REPLACE(postcode, ' ','') = REPLACE({address_search},' ',''))
OR (concat(trim(concat(sao,' ',pao)),' ',street_name) like concat('%',{address_search},'%'))
)
AND length(REPLACE({address_search},' ',''))>3
OR street_name = {address_search}
ORDER BY pao,sao,street_name ASC LIMIT 100","results_page_columns_db":"","secure_fields_db_database":"","escapeTokens":"yes"}
